Docs.summary:
[Protocol Method] Creates or updates an entity to a collection. Existing entity is matched using its unique guid if supplied or by its unique attributes eg: qualifiedName. Map and array of collections are not well supported. E.g., array<array<int>>, array<map<string, int>>.
This protocol method allows explicit creation of the request and processing of the response for advanced scenarios.
Docs.returns: The response returned from the service.
